Docs.summary: The base class for camera controls and information.

Docs.summary: Scene change is detected within the AF region(s).

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Scene change is not detected within the AF region(s).

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Hardware.Camera2.ControlExtendedSceneMode enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Bokeh effect must not slow down capture rate relative to sensor raw output, and the effect is applied to all processed streams no larger than the maximum streaming dimension.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Hardware.Camera2.ControlExtendedSceneMode enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: High quality bokeh mode is enabled for all non-raw streams (including YUV, JPEG, and IMPLEMENTATION_DEFINED) when capture intent is STILL_CAPTURE.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Hardware.Camera2.ControlExtendedSceneMode enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Extended scene mode is disabled.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Use a specific extended scene mode.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Lens distortion correction is applied without reducing frame rate relative to sensor output.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: High-quality distortion correction is applied, at the cost of possibly reduced frame rate relative to sensor output.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: No distortion correction is applied.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: To be added.

Docs.summary: The value of is relative to the position of the primary gyroscope of this Android device.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The value of is relative to the optical center of the largest camera device facing the same direction as this camera.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The camera device cannot represent the values of and accurately enough.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: A software mechanism is used to synchronize between the physical cameras.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The camera device supports frame timestamp synchronization at the hardware level, and the timestamp of a physical stream image accurately reflects its start-of-exposure time.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The camera device supports the OFFLINE_PROCESSING use case.

Docs.summary: The camera device is only accessible by Android's system components and privileged applications.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Do not include OIS data in the capture result.

Docs.summary: Include OIS data in the capture result.
